name: Jump Hit!
description:
Welcome to the dramatic world of broken glasses!

Now, it’s time to test your agility skills. Jump, hit, repeat!
Our simple and addictive gameplay leaves no chances for a boring day. Stay concentrated and break glasses with a ball. Get maximum fun from the game with its juicy and detailed graphics.

GAME FEATURES

- Enjoy one-tap easy control. The ball is crashing the barriers with just a tap!
- Choose any ball you want. Change your ball to an emoji, flag or another subject!
- Get a unique casual gaming experience. The ball is bouncing up and down. You only need to tap and hit the glasses.

Practice daily and rock it!

Join us! Now you have a legal way to break all the glasses near you!
